name: Student's Path
text:
Enchant creature

As Student's Path enters the battlefield, choose Monk or Wizard. If {u}{r} was spent to cast this spell, choose both instead.

• Monk — Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and is a Monk in addition to its other types.

• Wizard — Enchanted creature has ward {3} and is a Wizard in addition to its other types.
